import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; export default function AboutUs() { return ( <>
Welcome to Bestchill Inc.
Your Trusted Partner in Advanced Cooling Solutions
At Bestchill Inc., we specialize in high-performance, portable cooling systems designed to keep you—and your cargo—cool, safe, and comfortable. Whether you're on the road, at a campsite, or transporting perishable goods, we’ve got you covered.
); }
